body:
Comment 8: 
I've downloaded mongodb 2.6.0 from
https://www.mongodb.org/dr//fastdl.mongodb.org/linux/mongodb-linux-x86_64-2.6.0.tgz/download
but it still fails:

$ mongod -v
2014-04-15T15:06:21.509+0400 [initandlisten] db version v2.6.0

$ go test -v launchpad.net/juju-core/cmd/jujud
=== RUN TestPackage
----------------------------------------------------------------------
PANIC: bootstrap_test.go:92: BootstrapSuite.SetUpTest
[LOG] 36.85478 DEBUG juju.testing tls.Dial(127.0.0.1:58107) failed with dial tcp
127.0.0.1:58107: connection refused
[LOG] 36.85478 DEBUG juju.testing tls.Dial(127.0.0.1:58107) failed with dial tcp
127.0.0.1:58107: connection refused
[LOG] 36.85478 ERROR juju mongodb has exited without being killed
[LOG] 36.85478 ERROR juju mongod: Error parsing command line: unknown option
sslOnNormalPorts
[LOG] 36.85478 ERROR juju mongod: try 'mongod --help' for more information
[LOG] 36.85478 DEBUG juju.testing tls.Dial(127.0.0.1:58107) failed with dial tcp
127.0.0.1:58107: connection refused
... Panic: no reachable servers (PC=0x40EDCD)

/ssd/src/go2/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:248
  in panic
/ssd/src/gopath/src/launchpad.net/juju-core/testing/mgo.go:267
  in MgoInstance.MustDial
/ssd/src/gopath/src/launchpad.net/juju-core/testing/mgo.go:331
  in MgoSuite.SetUpTest
bootstrap_test.go:94
  in BootstrapSuite.SetUpTest
/ssd/src/go2/src/pkg/runtime/asm_amd64.s:345
  in call16

----------------------------------------------------------------------
PANIC: bootstrap_test.go:100: BootstrapSuite.TearDownTest

... Panic: no reachable servers (PC=0x40EDCD)

/ssd/src/go2/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:248
  in panic

  in MgoInstance.MustDial
/ssd/src/gopath/src/launchpad.net/juju-core/testing/mgo.go:345
  in MgoInstance.Reset
